mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${prefix}_RUN_TASK (ID, PROCESSINSTANCE_ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_ID, VERSION, TOKEN_ID, NODE_ID, SUBJECT,COMPLETEDESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_ID, ASSIGNEE, CLAIM_TIME, NAME, CREATE_TIME, START_TIME, ISBLOCKING, END_TIME, PROCESSSTART_TIME,PROCESS_INITIATOR, DUEDATE, PRIORITY, CATEGORY, OWNER, DELEGATIONSTATE, BIZKEY, COMMAND_TYPE, COMMAND_MESSAGE, TASK_COMMENT, NODE_NAME, PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY, FORMURI, TASKGROUP, TASKTYPE, PROCESSDEFINITION_NAME, ISCANCELLED, ISSUSPENDED, ISOPEN, ISDRAFT, EXPECTED_EXECUTIONTIME, AGENT, ADMIN, FORMURIVIEW, CALLACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, COMMAND_ID, PENDINGTASKID, ARCHIVE_TIME,REV_ ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{completeDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isBlocking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{processInitiator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delegationState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commandMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCancelled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSuspended,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectedExecutionTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formUriView,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callActivityInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pendingTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE ${prefix}_RUN_TASK SET PROCESSINSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSDEFINITION_ID = #{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOKEN_ID = #{tokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPLETEDESCRIPTION = #{completeDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNEE = #{assignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLAIM_TIME = #{claimTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISBLOCKING = #{isBlocking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROCESSSTART_TIME = #{processStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROCESS_INITIATOR = #{processInitiator,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DUEDATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELEGATIONSTATE = #{delegationStateString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIZKEY = #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMAND_TYPE = #{commandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMAND_MESSAGE = #{commandMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_COMMENT = #{taskComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY = #{processDefinitionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORMURI = #{formUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASKGROUP = #{taskGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASKTYPE = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSDEFINITION_NAME = #{processDefinitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISCANCELLED = #{isCancelled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUSPENDED = #{isSuspended,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISOPEN = #{isOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDRAFT = #{isDraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPECTED_EXECUTIONTIME = #{expectedExecutionTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENT = #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN = #{admin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORMURIVIEW = #{formUriView,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALLACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = #{callActivityInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMAND_ID = #{commandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PENDINGTASKID = #{pendingTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARCHIVE_TIME = #{archiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REV_ = #{revisionNext,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REV_ = #{revision,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: ID, PROCESSINSTANCE_ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_ID, VERSION, TOKEN_ID, NODE_ID,SUBJECT,COMPLETEDESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_ID, ASSIGNEE, CLAIM_TIME, NAME, CREATE_TIME, START_TIME, ISBLOCKING, END_TIME, DUEDATE, PRIORITY, CATEGORY, OWNER, DELEGATIONSTATE, BIZKEY, COMMAND_TYPE, COMMAND_MESSAGE, TASK_COMMENT, NODE_NAME, PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY, FORMURI, TASKGROUP,PROCESS_INITIATOR, TASKTYPE, PROCESSDEFINITION_NAME, ISCANCELLED, ISSUSPENDED, ISOPEN, ISDRAFT, EXPECTED_EXECUTIONTIME, AGENT, ADMIN, FORMURIVIEW, CALLACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, COMMAND_ID, PENDINGTASKID, ARCHIVE_TIME,REV_
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ${prefix}_RUN_TASK where END_TIME IS NOT NULL AND TASKTYPE = 'foxbpmtask'
AND TOKEN_ID IN
#{item}
ORDER BY END_TIME DESC
